title: Preparation of HMn2O4 lithium-ion sieves with low manganese dissolution loss for improved cycling stability
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,19795-19805
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02757D, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Longyan Song, Minxia Liu, Min Nian, Gang Yang
A new ozone eluent was used, the Mn dissolution loss of LiMn2O4 during the elution process was controlled at a shallow level, which improved the cyclic stability of the lithium-ion sieves.
